solution_line_template: So she has ${total_money} - ${adult_ticket_cost} = $<<{total_money}-{adult_ticket_cost}={money_for_children}>>{money_for_children} left for children.
She could take ${money_for_children} / ${child_ticket_cost}/child = <<{money_for_children}/{child_ticket_cost}={num_children}>>{num_children} children with her.
